TopicTitle: Kerbals and landers sometimes floating slightly above the ground.

Articles.Content: This one always annoyed me and kind of ruined the immersion in KSP 1 just seeing objects or Kerbals floating slightly above ground, I hope they find a way to fix it or even better add a ground effect like they showed in the trailer - https://youtube.com/clip/UgwVSDWIxSth4c8F6QN4AaABCQ
